ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We were gracious to you another time
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We have bestowed Our favour on you before this
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We have again bestowed Our favour upon you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: It is the second time that We have bestowed upon you Our favor.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And indeed We had bestowed upon you a favour one more time.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed We conferred a favor on you another time (before)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly We bestowed on you a favor at another time;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Already another time We favoured thee,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And indeed, another time, already We have shown thee favour,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Indeed, We showed Our favour to you before also,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly We conferred a benefit on thee anot her time.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly, We have done you a favour another time,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And indeed We conferred a favour on thee another time (before).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed We conferred a favour on you another time (before).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We had already shown you favor
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We had favored you another time.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We had already conferred favor upon you another time,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:37] And certainly, We have done you a favour [already] another time,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And indeed, another time) other than this time, (already We have shown thee favour) We have favoured you at another time, i.e. other than this time,
